attributes.action: UK Government to put Diplomatic Pressure on Jordanian Embassy in London for Assaad Jumaa ' s Case
attributes.additional_details: I request Diplomatic Pressure and Assistance via the Jordanian Embassy in London to END the on - going 16 years of Dispute of Land Ownership which Assaad Jumaa inherited from his late Father who was a Prime Minister of Jordan. This Land was taken over by The Ministry of Agriculture in 1998 on the basis that it was abandoned Land 18 months after Assaad Jumaa applied for its Registration to the Heirs of Saad Jumaa. Assistance is also being sought to restore to Assaad Jumaa his Human Rights.
